full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number**
--------------------------------
CB-866-5238227

**Publication Date**
------------------
August 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------
November 24, 2023, 13:00 EST

**Services**
-----------------
The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Professional Engineering Services. This tender is open to all qualified contractors.

**Description**
----------------
The services required under this RFSO include:

* Analysis of project scope of work
* Investigations, studies, and reports
* Design concept development
* Construction documents preparation
* Pre-tender construction cost estimate and project schedule development
* Tender call, bid evaluation, and construction contract award
* Construction administration and contract management
* Post-construction services

**Regions of Opportunity**
---------------------------
* Newfoundland and Labrador

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------
Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Contracting Entity Address**
-----------------------------
301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6

**Contact Information**
------------------------
Karen Dolan
DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
782-377-7245

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------
This RFSO is open to contractors who are certified under the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**What is Required**
---------------------------
Contractors must submit a bid that includes the following:

* The RFSO number (CB-866-5238227)
* The name of the contractor and their contact information
* A detailed proposal outlining their understanding of the services required
* A budget and timeline for completion of the services

The Government of Canada will evaluate the bids based on a combination of technical merit and price.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------
Additional information about this RFSO can be found at:

* Attachment 1: Addendum 1
* Attachment 2: Doing Business in Canada

Please note that this RFSO is open to all qualified contractors and will remain open until the closing date. Contractors are encouraged to submit their bids well in advance of the closing date to ensure that they are considered for this opportunity.
